messages.content: He wrote down a long list of items.
A long list of items, down he wrote. Hmm.
The duke left the park in a silver coach.
Left the park in a silver coach, the duke did.
A siege will crack the strong defense.
Crack the strong defense, a siege will.
The odor of spring makes young hearts jump.
Makes young hearts jump, the odor of spring does.
A cold dip restores health and zest.
Restores health and zest, a cold dip does.
The wagon moved on well oiled wheels.
On well-oiled wheels, the wagon moved.
Pitch the straw through the door of the stable.
Hrrmmm. Through the door of the stable, pitch the straw, you must.
Put the chart on the mantel and tack it down.
On the mantel, put the chart, and tack it down, you must.
Beat the dust from the rug onto the lawn.
Onto the lawn, beat the dust from the rug, you must.
Breathe deep and smell the piny air.
Deep, breathe, and the piny air smell. Yes, hrrmmm.
Read verse out loud for pleasure.
For pleasure, read verse out loud, you must.
The three story house was built of stone.
Built of stone, the three-story house was. Yrsssss.
She was kind to sick old people.
Kind to sick old people, she was.
A salt pickle tastes fine with ham.
Tastes fine with ham, a salt pickle does.
Fish evade the net, and swim off.
Hrrmmm. Evade the net, fish do, and off they swim. Yrsssss.
Dispense with a vest on a day like this.
On a day like this, dispense with a vest, you must.
Ducks fly north but lack a compass.
Hrrmmm. Fly north but lack a compass, ducks do. Yes, hrrrm.
The young kid jumped the rusty gate.
The rusty gate, the young kid jumped.
Fasten two pins on each side.
On each side, fasten two pins, you must. Hrmmm.
It is a band of steel three inches wide.
A band of steel, three inches wide, it is. Yes, hrrmmm.
Sever the twine with a quick snip of the knife.
With a quick snip of the knife, sever the twine, you must.
Dull stories make her laugh.
Make her laugh, dull stories do. Yes, hrrrm.
Jerk the cord, and out tumbles the gold.
The cord jerk, and out the gold tumbles. Hrmmm.
The way to save money is not to spend much.
Not to spend much, the way to save money is.
Cap the jar with a tight brass cover.
With a tight brass cover, cap the jar, you must.
Feel the heat of the weak dying flame.
Feel the heat of the weak dying flame, you must.
Let it burn, it gives us warmth and comfort.
Let it burn, you must, warmth and comfort it gives us.
Many hands help get the job done.
Help get the job done, many hands do. Hrmmm.
Fly by night, and you waste little time.
To little time waste, fly by night, you must. Yes, hrrrm.
The nozzle of the fire hose was bright brass.
Bright brass, the nozzle of the fire hose was. Hmm.
Drop the ashes on the worn old rug.
On the worn old rug, drop the ashes, you must.
It snowed, rained, and hailed the same morning.
Snowed, rained, and hailed the same morning, it did. Yes, hrrrm.
The first worm gets snapped early.
Gets snapped early, the first worm does.
You cannot brew tea in a cold pot.
Brew tea in a cold pot, you cannot.
The doorknob was made of bright clean brass.
Made of bright clean brass, the doorknob was. Yes, hrrrm.
His hip struck the knee of the next player.
The knee of the next player, his hip struck.
The corner store was robbed last night.
Robbed last night, the corner store was.
A joy to every child is the swan boat.
To every child, a joy, the swan boat is. Hmm.
The baby puts his right foot in his mouth.
In his mouth, the baby his right foot puts.
The paper box is full of thumb tacks.
Is full of thumb tacks, the paper box is.
He ordered peach pie with ice cream.
Peach pie with ice cream, he ordered. Yrsssss.
A fence cuts through the corner lot.
Hrrmmm. Cuts through the corner lot, a fence does. Hmm.
He smoke a big pipe with strong contents.
A big pipe with strong contents, he smoke. Yrsssss.
The chair looked strong but had no bottom.
Strong but had no bottom, the chair looked.
The crooked maze failed to fool the mouse.
Failed to fool the mouse, the crooked maze did. Yes, hrrrm.
The cone costs five cents on Mondays.
On Mondays, the cone, five cents, costs. Yes, hrrrm.
The spot on the blotter was made by green ink.
Hrrmmm. Made by green ink, the spot on the blotter was.
The doctor cured him with these pills.
With these pills, him, the doctor cured.
The hat brim was wide and too droopy.
Wide and too droopy, the hat brim was.
Hoist the load to your left shoulder.
Hoist the load to your left shoulder, you must.
The term ended in late June that year.
Hrrmmm. In late June that year, the term ended.
The two met while playing on the sand.
While playing on the sand, the two met.
The screen before the fire kept in the sparks.
Kept in the sparks, the screen before the fire did. Hrmmm.
The steady drip is worse than a drenching rain.
Worse than a drenching rain, a steady drip is. Yes, hrrrm.
The child crawled into the dense grass.
Into the dense grass, the child crawled.
Act on these orders with great speed.
With great speed, on these orders, act.
Light maple makes for a swell room.
Light maple makes for a swell room, it does.
Help the weak to preserve their strength.
To preserve their strength, help the weak, you must. Yes, hrrmmm.
A wisp of cloud hung in the blue air.
In the blue air, a wisp of cloud hung.
Use a pencil to write the first draft.
To write the first draft, use a pencil, you must. Yes, hrrmmm.
This strong arm shall shield your honor.
Shield your honor, this strong arm shall.
Type out three lists of orders.
Type out three lists of orders, you must.
A smatter of French is worse than none.
Worse than none, a smatter of French is.
The pipe ran almost the length of the ditch.
Almost the length of the ditch, the pipe ran.
Stop and stare at the hard working man.
At the hardworking man, stop and stare, you must.
The thaw came early and freed the stream.
Early, the thaw came, and the stream, freed. Yes, hrrmmm.
Add the store's account to the last cent.
Hrrmmm. To the last cent, the store's account add.
The desk and both chairs were painted tan.
Painted tan, the desk and both chairs were.
The clothes dried on a thin wooden rack.
On a thin wooden rack, the clothes dried.
The horse balked and threw the tall rider.
Threw the tall rider, the horse balked and did.
The stray cat gave birth to kittens.
Gave birth to kittens, the stray cat did.
Women form less than half of the group.
Less than half of the group, women form.
Ten pins were set in order.
In order, ten pins were set.
The man went to the woods to gather sticks.
To gather sticks, to the woods, the man went.
They sang the same tunes at each party.
The same tunes at each party, they sang.
The pencil was cut to be sharp at both ends.
Sharp at both ends, the pencil was cut to be. Yes, hrrrm.
The sky that morning was clear and bright blue.
Clear and bright blue, the sky that morning was.
The loss of the second ship was hard to take.
Hrrmmm. Hard to take, the loss of the second ship was.
The ram scared the school children off.
The school children off, the ram scared.
The play began as soon as we sat down.
As soon as we sat down, the play began. Hmm.
The heart beat strongly and with firm strokes.
With firm strokes, the heart beat strongly.
Thick glasses helped him read the print.
Helped him read the print, thick glasses did. Yes, hrrrm.
He broke his ties with groups of former friends.
With groups of former friends, his ties, he broke.
Weave the carpet on the right hand side.
Hrrmmm. On the right-hand side, weave the carpet, you must. Hrmmm.
The square peg will settle in the round hole.
In the round hole, the square peg settle will. Yrsssss.
A strong bid may scare your partner stiff.
A strong bid may scare your partner stiff, it can.
We don't like to admit our small faults.
To admit our small faults, we don't like.
The curtain rose and the show was on.
Rose, the curtain did, and on the show was. Hmm.
The wreck occurred by the bank on Main Street.
By the bank on Main Street, the wreck occurred.
He broke a new shoelace that day.
A new shoelace that day, he broke. Hmm.
Slide the tray across the glass top.
Across the glass top, the tray slide. Yes, hrrmmm.
Cut the pie into large parts.
Into large parts, cut the pie, you must.
The box was thrown beside the parked truck.
Beside the parked truck, the box was thrown. Yes, hrrrm.
Some ads serve to cheat buyers.
Serve to cheat buyers, some ads do.
Add salt before you fry the egg.
Before you fry the egg, add salt, you must.
The friendly gang left the drug store.
The drug store, the friendly gang left. Hrmmm.
Write a fond note to the friend you cherish.
To the friend you cherish, write a fond note, you must. Yrsssss.
The fight will end in just six minutes.
In just six minutes, the fight, end, will.
The nag pulled the frail cart along.
Pulled the frail cart along, the nag did. Hmm.
Loop the braid to the left and then over.
Hrrmmm. To the left, loop the braid, and then over, you must.
The ancient coin was quite dull and worn.
Quite dull and worn, the ancient coin was.
He said the same phrase thirty times.
The same phrase thirty times, he said.
He sent the figs, but kept the ripe cherries.
The figs, he sent, but the ripe cherries, he kept.
Birth and death mark the limits of life.
Mark the limits of life, birth and death do. Yrsssss.
The dark pot hung in the front closet.
Hung in the front closet, the dark pot was. Yrsssss.
Try to have the court decide the case.
Decide the case, have the court, try to.
Help the woman get back to her feet.
Back to her feet, help the woman get.
The lake sparkled in the red hot sun.
Hrrmmm. In the red hot sun, the lake sparkled.
The store walls were lined with colored frocks.
Lined with colored frocks, the store walls were. Yes, hrrrm.
The room was crowded with a wild mob.
Crowded with a wild mob, the room was. Yrsssss.
Canned pears lack full flavor.
Lack full flavor, canned pears do. Yrsssss.
Schools for ladies teach charm and grace.
Teach charm and grace, schools for ladies do. Hmm.
The flint sputtered and lit a pine torch.
A pine torch, the flint sputtered and lit. Hrmmm.
They took the axe and the saw to the forest.
To the forest, the axe and the saw, they took. Yes, hrrrm.
Pages bound in cloth make a book.
A book, pages bound in cloth, make. Yes, hrrrm.
Let's all join as we sing the last chorus.
As we sing the last chorus, let's all join, you must.
We talked of the slide show in the circus.
Of the slide show in the circus, we talked.
The urge to write short stories is rare.
To write short stories, the urge is rare. Hrmmm.
Nine men were hired to dig the ruins.
To dig the ruins, hired, nine men were.
Poached eggs and tea must suffice.
Poached eggs and tea suffice must. Hmm.
He wrote his name boldly at the top of tile sheet.
Boldly at the top of the sheet, his name he wrote.
The shaky barn fell with a loud crash.
With a loud crash, the shaky barn fell.
Oak is strong and also gives shade.
Strong, oak is, and also shade, gives.
Tight curls get limp on rainy days.
On rainy days, tight curls get limp. Yes, hrrrm.
The list of names is carved around the base.
Carved around the base, the list of names is. Hrmmm.
An abrupt start does not win the prize.
Does not win the prize, an abrupt start does. Hmm.
Seven seals were stamped on great sheets.
Stamped on great sheets, seven seals were. Yes, hrrmmm.
A thin stripe runs down the middle.
Down the middle, a thin stripe runs. Hmm.
The zones merge in the central part of town.
In the central part of town, the zones merge.
Press the pedal with your left foot.
With your left foot, the pedal press, you must.
Fill your pack with bright trinkets for the poor.
With bright trinkets for the poor, fill your pack, you must.
The small pup gnawed a hole in the sock.
A hole in the sock, the small pup gnawed.
A vent near the edge brought in fresh air.
Fresh air, a vent near the edge brought in. Hmm.
Mark the spot with a sign painted red.
With a sign painted red, mark the spot, you must. Hrmmm.
The mail comes in three batches per day.
Three batches per day, the mail comes in. Yrsssss.
If you mumble your speech will be lost.
Mumble your speech, and lost it will be. Yes, hrrrm.
The rush for funds reached its peak Tuesday.
Reached its peak Tuesday, the rush for funds did.
Even a just cause needs power to win.
Power to win, even a just cause needs. Yes, hrrrm.
A quart of milk is water for the most part.
Water for the most part, a quart of milk is.
The grass and bushes were wet with dew.
Wet with dew, the grass and bushes were.
Paste can cleanse the most dirty brass.
Cleanse the most dirty brass, paste can.
A round mat will cover the dull spot.
The dull spot, a round mat cover will.
Both lost their lives in the raging storm.
In the raging storm, both their lives lost.
There was a sound of dry leaves outside.
Hrrmmm. Of dry leaves outside, a sound there was.
